title: Hinterwaldkopf
text:
The Hinterwaldkopf is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a>, , in the <a href="Southern%20Black%20Forest">Southern Black Forest</a> in <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. It lies in the southeastern part of the <a href="drainage%20basin">catchment area</a> of the <a href="Dreisam">Dreisam</a> east of <a href="Freiburg%20im%20Breisgau">Freiburg im Breisgau</a> between <a href="Kirchzarten">Kirchzarten</a> and <a href="Hinterzarten">Hinterzarten</a>. To the north it is bounded by the 
<a href="H%C3%B6llental%20%28Schwarzwald%29">Höllental</a> valley, to the south by the <a href="Krummbach%20%28Dreisam%29">Zastler valley</a>. Nearby settlements include <a href="Kirchzarten">Kirchzarten</a>, <a href="Oberried%20%28Breisgau%29">Oberried (Breisgau)</a>, <a href="Falkensteig">Falkensteig</a> (part of <a href="Buchenbach">Buchenbach</a>) and <a href="Hinterzarten">Hinterzarten</a>. 
The characteristic outline of the Hinterwaldkopf is a symbol of the <a href="Dreisam">Dreisam</a> valley. Its open summit region offers views over the valley to the <a href="Kandel%20%28mountain%29">Kandel</a>. A trail managed by the <a href="Black%20Forest%20%20Club">Black Forest Club</a> runs over the mountain.
